item.title: Project 2 – API Documentation
item.description:
Project 2 – API Documentation

Documenting RESTful API endpoints for Project 2
built with Laravel, PHP & MySQL.

Database Tables

This API connects to two MySQL tables:

  1. items
  2. lists

Table Schemas - items

CREATE TABLE items ( id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, list_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NULL, FOREIGN KEY (list_id) REFERENCES lists(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
